question: I want your advise that whether i could cut hair above my nose or not
answer:
QUESTION

I have hair above my nose and therefore, my two eyebrows are joined. So my physical appearance does not look as effective as I want.Therefore, I want your advise that whether i could cut hair above my nose or not. Basically, I want to cut this hair by electrolysis.I would be waiting for your advise as per Isalamic Law

ANSWER


Share:

It is recorded in the book of Fatawa Raddul Mukhtaar (vol.2 pg.418), ‘There is no harm in a man trimming his eyebrows or facial hair (besides the beard) as long as it does not resemble women.’

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
